content: Singaporean award **Pravasi Express Awards** were introduced in 2013 for appreciating personalities for outstanding contributions to society and endeavours in their chosen field/profession. The awards are overseen by Pravasi Publications from [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), publishers of the [Pravasi Express](/wiki/Pravasi_Express) Newspaper. ## History The first Pravasi Express Awards were presented on 4 August 2013 in a public function at Spring Auditorium, [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) with over 400 guests. The Former [Chief Minister](/wiki/Chief_Minister) of [Kerala](/wiki/Kerala) [V. S. Achuthanandan](/wiki/V._S._Achuthanandan) was awarded the first [Pravasi Express](/wiki/Pravasi_Express) "Life Achievement Award" in the ceremony. The award ceremony was presided over by [Ambassador-at-Large](/wiki/Ambassador-at-Large) Gopinatha Pillai with the presence of [Malayalam](/wiki/Malayalam) Lyrist [Anil Panachooran](/wiki/Anil_Panachooran) and actor [Unni Mukundan](/wiki/Unni_Mukundan). The second edition of Pravasi Express Awards were presented during the third anniversary celebration of [Pravasi Express](/wiki/Pravasi_Express) held on 5 July 2014 at Nexus Auditorium, [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). The awards ceremony was presided over by [Ambassador-at-Large](/wiki/Ambassador-at-Large) Gopinatha Pillai and singer [Jayachandran](/wiki/P._Jayachandran) was awarded the "Life Achievement Award" for his contribution to music. National Award winner [Priyamani](/wiki/Priyamani) received the "Youth Icon Award". There were musical performances from [Jayachandran](/wiki/P._Jayachandran), Chandralekha, Ragesh Brahmanandan and Snehaja. ## Awards Pravasi Express awards are given to Indians from different part of the world, to honor their contributions to society and endeavours in their chosen field/profession. The awards cover different categories including social commitment, business excellence, contribution to [Malayalee](/wiki/Malayalee) diaspora, arts and also to appreciate the emerging champions in all the categories. ### 2020 Awards Pravasi Express Awards 2020 were awarded in a virtual event held on 18 July 2020. [T.P Sreenivasan](/wiki/T._P._Sreenivasan), former IFS Official and Ambassador was awarded the Malayalee Ratna Award. He has served as secretary of legation in Tokyo, Thimphu, Moscow. He has also served as a permanent representative of India to the United Nations. PE Life Time Achievement Award was presented to the renowned dancer, founder and chief mentor / trainer of Baskar's Academy - Mrs Santha Bhaskar for her six-long decade's significant contribution in the field of music and dance. Young talented actor [Tovino Thomas](/wiki/Tovino_Thomas) was awarded the Youth icon award and the award event was followed by musical performance from [Harish Sivaramakrishnan](/wiki/Harish_Sivaramakrishnan). Nair, [Pravasi Express](/wiki/Pravasi_Express) Chief Editor Mr.Rajesh Kumar, [Chengannur](/wiki/Chengannur) [MLA](/wiki/Member_of_the_Legislative_Assembly_(India)) [Saji Cherian](/wiki/Saji_Cherian) and Singapore Kairali Kala Nilayam secretary Mr.Basil Baby. Poet and activist [Sugathakumari](/wiki/Sugathakumari) was honored with the *Pravasi Express Lifetime Achievement Award* for her contribution to [Malayalam Literature](/wiki/Malayalam_literature). Award night was followed by a musical performance from [Shahabaz Aman](/wiki/Shahabaz_Aman) and dance performance by Film actor [Arya Rohit](/wiki/Arya_Rohit). Malayalam comedy actor Ullas Pandalam and team also entertained the guests. Award night also witnessed the inauguration of Singapore Kairali Film Forum (SKFF) by Singapore Film director [K. Rajagopal](/wiki/K._Rajagopal_(director)) which was followed by the screening of the first micro film from SKFF *Godfather*. Veteran Playback Singer [Vani Jayaram](/wiki/Vani_Jayaram) was awarded the *Pravasi Express Lifetime Achievement Award* for her contribution to Indian film industry and Malayalam film actor [Suraj Venjaramood](/wiki/Suraj_Venjaramood) was awarded with *Pravasi Express acting Excellence Award* for his contribution to Malayalam film industry . Award night was followed by music from [Vani Jayaram](/wiki/Vani_Jayaram) and actor [Suraj Venjaramood](/wiki/Suraj_Venjaramood) entertained the crowd. Abhijeet Kollam, Vaishnav Girish and Praseeda also sang. Minister Mr. AK Balan presided over the function and also inaugurated the 60th anniversary celebrations of Kairalee Kala Nilayam, Singapore. Veteran Film actor [Madhu (actor)](/wiki/Madhu_(actor)) was honored with the Pravasi Express Lifetime Achievement Award for his contribution to [Malayalam](/wiki/Malayalam) film industry and Football Legend [IM Vijayan](/wiki/IM_Vijayan) was awarded with Pravasi Express Lifetime Sports Excellence Award. The event was preceded over by [Pravasi Express](/wiki/Pravasi_Express) [Editor-in-Chief](/wiki/Editor-in-Chief) G Rajesh Kumar and [K B Ganesh Kumar](/wiki/Ganesh_Kumar), film actor and former Kerala minister was the guest of honour. The award function was followed by music led by [G Venugopal](/wiki/G_Venugopal) and drama by Singapore Kairalee Kala Nilayam, [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore).
